page.title: 10Employment
page.content: We have sent out 40 questionaires to the households main wage earner and we have had 37 replies. 30 of them were working and 2 of them were retired. The other 5 were not working. We thought that there would be about 6 people who worked regulary abroad but there were 13 people altogether. 56% of the wage earners worked at places over 10 miles away from Ashton, 35% worked within 10 miles of Ashton and 3 people worked in Ashton. 2 of these work on the same farm. Most people travel to work by car. 2 by bus and 1 by train. Half the people in our survey work in the chemical industries at Ellesmere Port and Runcorn. Amazingly enough there is only 1 person who has a part time job.
